mapper.select: SELECT * FROM clientview WHERE owner_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR pet_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%') OR owner_tel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_value}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation SET reservation_date = #{reservation_date}, reservation_memo = #{reservation_memo }, reservation_yn = 'y', reservation_time=NOW(), staff_no = (SELECT staff_no FROM staff WHERE staff_id = #{staff_id} ), pet_no = #{petNo};
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY r.reserv_date) AS rno,r.pet_name,r.owner_name,r.reserv_date FROM (SELECT * FROM reservationview WHERE DATE_FORMAT(reservation_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE()) r ORDER BY rno

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY i.receive_time) AS ino,i.pet_name,i.owner_name,i.receive_state,i.pay_yn FROM (SELECT * FROM indexreceivepay WHERE DATE_FORMAT(receive_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE()) i ORDER BY ino
